channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 10:09 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack, traffic in the direction of city center
item.description: 🟠 10:09 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack, traffic in the direction of city center #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
